name: BnB 666
description:
BnB 666

A trip to a modest bed and breakfast turns south fast as Johnny becomes trapped within! The demons throughout the manor are hungry for human flesh and are eager to make contracts for as much of Johnny's  body as possible. Fend off your foes using your life as currency - if you play your cards right you might just get out alive.

This is an entry to Ludum Dare 44 and the first ever game Jam entry by the two person team made up of Maximillian Taubert and Bram Williams.
